Summary: OBJECT MOVING AT EXTREAM SPEEDS ACROSS SKY
divs: Sighting DetailsOBJECT LOOKED LIKE A SATELIGHT BUT MOVED AT A SPEED THAT I HAVE NEVER SEEN BEFORE. THE OBJECT FINALLY BECAME TO FAR FOR ME TO SEE. IT WAS ORANGE IN COLOR AND THE SIZE OF STAR. I WAS LAYING ON THE DIVING BOARD STARING AT THE CLOUDS, WHILE HAVING A CONVERSATION WITH MY FIANCE AND THEN SHE WALKED OFF. AT THIS TIME IT WAS DARKER AND THEN I SAW IT. I CALLED HER AND HER MOM TO WITNESS THE OBJECT TOO. THE OBJECT MOVED STRAIGHT AT A HIGH VALOCITY OF SPEED. WITH THE SPEED IT WAS TRAVELING WE ALL TRHGOUGHT IT WAS A UFO, IT VERY QUICKLY RAN OUT OF OUR SIGHT.
